snippet: Todd Bertuzzi is now with the Red Wings, one of the least-penalized teams in hockey. Perhaps that will lessen the fallout from one of hockey’s most notorious incidents.
lead_paragraph: Todd Bertuzzi is now with the Red Wings, one of the least-penalized teams in hockey. Perhaps that will lessen the fallout from one of hockey’s most notorious incidents.

headline.seo: Todd Bertuzzi Hopes for Makeover With Red Wings in Career’s Final Act
headline.main: In Bertuzzi’s Last Stop, Hopes for a Makeover
headline.print_headline: In Bertuzzi’s Last Stop, Hopes for a Makeover
